events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the senior software engineer position, highlighting extensive experience in full stack development and cloud infrastructure.
HR team categorized the application under the Engineering cluster due to key terms such as software engineer, development, and cloud experience mentioned in the CV.
Recruiter Megan was assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process and coordinate subsequent interviews and communications.
Megan conducted a phone screening, where the candidate demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and a solid understanding of software engineering principles.
The candidate replied promptly and enthusiastically accepted the proposed date and time for the technical interview, expressing eagerness to proceed.
The technical interview was scheduled for May 7th at 11:00 AM with the engineering team using a video conferencing platform.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, answering coding challenges efficiently and discussing past projects in detail.
Following the successful technical round, the HR interview was scheduled for May 10th to discuss cultural fit and employment terms.
The HR interview was positive, with discussions about the company values, candidate expectations, and potential start dates.
An official job offer was generated and sent to the candidate, including salary details, benefits, and onboarding timelines.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about the possibility of joining the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer via email, confirming the agreed start date and requesting onboarding details.
The new hire began onboarding activities, including orientation sessions, account setups, and introductory meetings with the engineering team.
The recruitment process was successfully closed after the candidate completed onboarding and started working with the software development team.
